Issue.creator: lquintai
Issue.summary: Metadata tags for transaction submit/evaluate should be consistent across contract languages
Issue.description: submit - this is the only option * TS: transactions have *tag* array ** 'submitTx' --> submit ** --> evaluate (empty array!!) * Go: transactions have *tag* array ** 'submit' --> submit ** 'evaluate' --> evaluate * Java: transactions have *tags* array ** 'INVOKE' --> submit ** 'DEFAULT' --> submit ** 'QUERY' --> evaluate >
